Figure 3—source data 1.This 7-zip archive contains the data and source code used for Figure 3 (the analysis of mutation frequencies at site 151 after serial passage in the lab).

The code and all the FASTQ files are also available at http://dx.doi.org/10.5061/dryad.s3rs0.

DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.7554/eLife.13974.010

Download source data [figure-3—source-data-1.media-2.zip]
